Header: Speaker visits victims of recent bomb explosions
Content: Speaker Karu Jayasuriya visited hospitals to inquire into the wellbeing of the people who are undergoing treatment at hospitals after being injured due to Easter Sunday bomb attacks. The Speaker visited National Hospital to look into the welfare of the patients undergoing treatment for injuries caused by the explosions on Easter Sunday. Thereafter Speaker Karu Jayasuriya went to the Lady Ridgeway Hospital to look into the wellbeing of children who are undergoing treatment for the wounds due to the explosions on Easter Sunday. The Speaker exchanged views with the parents and relatives at the hospital.
